## Load libraries

```{r}
library("tidyverse")
```

## Load data

```{r}
# | echo: true
# | eval: true

#Load the file
body_measurements <- read_tsv(file = "../data/PCOS_body_measurements.tsv")
blood_measurements <- read_tsv(file = "../data/PCOS_blood_measurements.tsv")

```

# Augmenting data

```{r}
# | echo: true
# | eval: true

# Making PCOS diagnosis into yes and no
body_measurements <- body_measurements |> 
  mutate(PCOS_diagnosis = case_when(
    PCOS_diagnosis == '0' ~ "No",
    PCOS_diagnosis == '1' ~ "Yes"
  ))

```
